BrightBlade, Rage

* BrightBlade sighed as she got her few things together, ready to her off 
towards the Cybertronien Fire and check it out.
She exited her quarters and quickly transformed into her beast mode, then 
trotting off towards one of the exits of the ship located in the hall way 
she was in.
The door closed behind her and she simply stepped off into the wild unknown, 
still wondering and bit worried as to where Gangon had run off to.
She sighed again then then went out into a full run towards the new Maximal 
ship, knowing that she would have to pass the Alliance base in order to get 
there.
It wasn't long before she slowed down to a creeping walk, the Alliance base 
only a few hundred yards away. Keeping well out of auto gun range, knowing 
that she couldn't move very quickly with all the added weight of the extra 
equipment.*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage growled as she looked at the newer ship, more bigger then the other 
one she saw ( Ark ) but sometimes bigger meant bader.
She looked around the slowly began to approach the new ship, within scanner 
relays she could easily be picked up.*
